Pre-Game Insights: England and Gareth Southgate face Slovakia on Sunday in the Euro 2024 round of 16.
The Three Lions may have won Group C, but the hype surrounding them has all but evaporated on the back of three uninspiring performances.
Calls for Southgate to make significant changes have, so far, fallen on deaf ears.
All is certainly not lost. England have been solid defensively and the draw has been kind to them, with a favourable run to the final.
Slovakia are in the knockout stages on merit, having handed Belgium a shock 1-0 defeat in their Group E opener on their way to a third-place finish.
Post-Match Reflections: Details not provided as the match has not occurred yet.
